top_5_tennis_principles.description: Prioritize consistency over going for outright winners. Focus on a balanced winner-to-unforced error ratio to improve your chances of winning points.
Focus on a high first-serve percentage rather than just hitting aces. A consistent serve sets you up for success in the long run.
Prioritize accuracy over speed when hitting serves. Effective placement is a key factor in winning points.
Recognize the importance of forced errors and use aggressive shots with margin to make your opponent miss.
Consistently hit cross-court unless you have a tactical advantage to go down the line. Minimize running and maximize court coverage.
